description:
The spelling of "flavor" in the Nova client is americanized.  Those with a non-American English education might prefer to have aliases available for "flavour" in, e.g., "nova boot" and the various "nova flavor-*" commands.

There is a precedent in the gnu/linux world in grep where colour can be spelt color, e.g. in grep:

grep --help | grep colo
      --color[=WHEN],
      --colour[=WHEN]       use markers to highlight the matching strings;
title: Provide non-American English alias for 'nova boot --flavor'
